thread.title: Nicola Sturgeon defends record on NHS
thread.title_full: Nicola Sturgeon defends record on NHS - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Nicola Sturgeon defends record on NHS
text:
53
Have your say NICOLA Sturgeon yesterday launched a defence of her government’s treatment of the NHS amid mounting criticism of claims she made that the service was performing better than it did under Labour.
The First Minister spoke out at the Plaid Cymru conference yesterday, as her opponents stepped up their attacks on the SNP’s stewardship of the health service.
As Labour attempted to link NHS failings to Ms Sturgeon’s tenure as Health Secretary, the First Minister defended her record.
